description:
With their second song complete, WUG prepares for their second concert.
However, WUG`s concert falls on the same day as the I-1 Club`s Sendai Theater opening concert. The town is painted in the colors of the I-1 Club and WUG is overwhelmed by the idol group`s power, but the girls put their best efforts into their lessons and advertise their own concert.
Source: crunchyroll
